p: The volatile oil of thymus endemic species from Algeria and Morocco was found to show cytotoxic properties against A375 human melanoma cell line with an IC50 46.95 μg·mL −1 [ 42]. A recent study depicted the antiproliferative activity against THP-1 human monocytic cell line of the volatile oil obtained from different species of thymus originating from Portugal [ 43]. The findings were supported by the group of Tefiani et al. [ 44] that concluded that Thymus munbyanus volatile oil collected from Algeria present remarkable antiproliferative effects against THP-1 human acute monocytic leukemia cell line.
